item.title: Beard Trim
item.description:

  • Neckline cleanup

  • Light styling with basic product

  • Hot towel treatment: +$8
  • Beard conditioning oil application: +$5
  • Combined with haircut: Save $5

item.title: Color & Highlights
item.description:
Straightforward color services for when you need a refresh without the salon markup. I keep it simple - basic colors, root touch-ups, and simple highlights that work for everyday life.

Base Service Includes:

  • Root touch-ups (single process)
  • Basic gray coverage n- Simple all-over color
  • Quick consultation to match your current shade

Available Add-Ons:

  • Simple highlights (partial): +$15
  • Toner/glaze for shine: +$10
  • Deep conditioning treatment: +$12

What I Don’t Do:

  • Complex color corrections
  • Fashion colors (vivid blues, pinks, etc.)
  • Bleach and tone services
  • Multi-dimensional balayage

Why Keep It Simple? As a mobile stylist, I carry essential color products that cover the most common needs. For complex color work, I recommend visiting a full-service salon. But for maintaining your current color or covering roots? I’ve got you covered at a price that makes sense.

item.title: Hair Treatments
item.description:
Optional add-on treatments to give your hair a little extra care. These aren’t fancy spa experiences - just effective conditioning treatments that actually work, added on to your haircut or color service.

Available Add-Ons:

Deep Conditioning Mask - $15

  • Intensive moisture treatment
  • Great for dry or damaged hair
  • Applied during your service
  • Adds 15 minutes

Protein Treatment - $20

  • Strengthens weak or brittle hair
  • Helps prevent breakage
  • Recommended before color services
  • Adds 20 minutes

Scalp Treatment - $12

item.title: Wash & Blow Dry
item.description:
Simple wash and blow dry service when you want to look put-together without the effort. No fancy styling techniques - just clean, dry, decent-looking hair that gets you through the week.

Base Service Includes:

  • Shampoo and rinse
  • Basic conditioning
  • Blow dry with round brush
  • Light smoothing

Pricing:

  • Short hair: $20
  • Medium/Long hair: $25

Add-Ons Available:

  • Flat iron/curling iron finish: +$10
  • Deep conditioning treatment: +$15
  • Scalp massage: +$5

Perfect For:

  • Looking presentable for work
  • Between haircuts when you need a refresh
  • Before events when you don’t want to deal with wet hair
  • When you just don’t feel like washing your own hair

What This Isn’t: This isn’t a salon blowout with volumizing products, round brush techniques, and styles that last for days. This is a straightforward wash and dry that looks neat and professional.

item.title: Wedding Day Styling
item.description:

Pricing:

  • Bride + 1: $100 (2-2.5 hours total)
  • Bride + 2: $130 (3-3.5 hours total)
